references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a foundational vision-language model that is extensively used and adapted in the current research on test-time adaptation.

references.paper_title: Test-time prompt tuning for zero-shot generalization in vision-language models
references.reason: This paper introduces TPT, a test-time adaptation method for vision-language models that is directly compared with and built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Test-time classifier adjustment module for model-agnostic domain generalization
references.reason: This paper introduces TDA, a training-free test-time adaptation method that is a primary baseline for comparison in this paper.

references.paper_title: Tent: Fully test-time adaptation by entropy minimization
references.reason: This paper introduces Tent, a test-time adaptation method using entropy minimization, which is theoretically analyzed in relation to the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Benchmarking neural network robustness to common corruptions and perturbations
references.reason: This paper introduces the ImageNet-C dataset, a benchmark dataset for evaluating the robustness of models to various corruptions, which is used for evaluation in the current work.
